item.title: [mid] Howl of the Hunt
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash

Enchant creature

When Howl of the Hunt enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature is a Wolf or Werewolf, untap that creature.

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

item.title: [mid] "Aerial Stunt Doubles"
item.description:
Creature — Human

"Aerial Stunt Doubles" enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

Coven — At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

item.title: [mid] Galvanic Iteration
item.description:
Instant

When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Flashback {1}{U}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [pj21] Edgar Markov
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Knight

Eminence — Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token.

First strike, haste

Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

item.title: [pj21] K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror Minion

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

Lifelink

For each {B} in a cost, you may pay 2 life rather than pay that mana.

Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth.

item.title: [pj21] Ezuri, Claw of Progress
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Elf Warrior

Whenever a creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you get an experience counter.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control, where X is the number of experience counters you have.

item.title: [pj21] Mizzix of the Izmagnus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Wizard

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value greater than the number of experience counters you have, you get an experience counter.

Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each experience counter you have.

item.title: [j21] Hell Mongrel
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Dog

Discard a card: Hell Mongrel gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [j21] Healer's Flock
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying, lifelink

item.title: [j21] Haunted Dead
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Haunted Dead enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

{1}{B}, Discard two cards: Return Haunted Dead from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [j21] Harrow
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [j21] Harmonic Prodigy
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

If an ability of a Shaman or another Wizard you control triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.

item.title: [j21] Hard Evidence
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 0/3 blue Crab creature token.

Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.description: Creature — Bear

item.title: [j21] Graveshifter
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

When Graveshifter enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [j21] Graceful Restoration
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

• Return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [j21] Gouged Zealot
item.description:
Creature — Cyclops Berserker

Reach

Delirium — Whenever Gouged Zealot attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Gouged Zealot deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.

item.title: [j21] Good-Fortune Unicorn
item.description:
Creature — Unicorn

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

item.title: [j21] Goblin Engineer
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Artificer

When Goblin Engineer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle.

{R}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [j21] Goblin Anarchomancer
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Each spell you cast that's red or green costs {1} less to cast.

item.title: [j21] Goatnap
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If that creature is a Goat, it also gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Glorious Enforcer
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying, lifelink

At the beginning of each combat, if you have more life than an opponent, Glorious Enforcer gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Glimmer Bairn
item.description:
Creature — Ouphe

Sacrifice a token: Glimmer Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Gilt-Blade Prowler
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only if you've discarded a card this turn.

item.title: [j21] Gilded Light
item.description:
Instant

You gain shroud until end of turn. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [j21] Ghost-Lit Drifter
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

{2}{U}: Another target creature gains flying until end of turn.

Channel — {X}{U}, Discard Ghost-Lit Drifter: X target creatures gain flying until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Geomancer's Gambit
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j21] Galvanic Relay
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top card of your library. During your next turn, you may play that card.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.title: [j21] Furyblade Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Berserker

Trample

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, Furyblade Vampire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Funnel-Web Recluse
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Reach

Morbid — When Funnel-Web Recluse enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [j21] Foundry Street Denizen
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Warrior

Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Foul Watcher
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Bird

Flying

When Foul Watcher enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Delirium — Foul Watcher gets +1/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [j21] Floodhound
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Dog

{3}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [j21] Fleshbag Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Warrior

When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [j21] Fists of Flame
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card. Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +1/+0 for each card you've drawn this turn.

item.title: [j21] First Sliver's Chosen
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have exalted. (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among permanents you control.)

item.title: [j21] Filigree Attendant
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Homunculus

Flying

Filigree Attendant's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

item.title: [j21] Fiery Temper
item.description:
Instant

Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target.

Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [j21] Faithless Salvaging
item.description:
Instant

Discard a card, then draw a card.

Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [j21] Fairgrounds Patrol
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

{1}{W}, Exile Fairgrounds Patrol from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.description:

Flying
